Public NotInheritable Class CallbackBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IEndpointBehavior
public ref class CallbackBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IEndpointBehavior
type CallbackBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IEndpointBehavior

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)]
[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)>]

summary.span: 在客户端应用程序中配置回调服务实现。

span.span: Configures a callback service implementation in a client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以配置或扩展客户端应用程序中回调协定实现的执行行为。Use the attribute to configure or extend the execution behavior of a callback contract implementation in a client application. 针对回调类，此属性与 属性执行的功能相同，不同之处在于实例化行为和事务设置。This attribute performs the same function for the callback class as the attribute with the exception of instancing behavior and transaction settings. 必须将 应用到实现回调协定的类。The must be applied to the class that implements the callback contract. 如果将其应用于非双工协定实现，则会在运行时引发 异常。If applied to a non-duplex contract implementation an exception is thrown at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 此外，还可以使用 属性来进行回调操作实现。You can also use the attribute for the callback operation implementations. 但是，如果对回调操作使用 ，则 属性必须为 ，否则会在运行时引发 异常。However, if is used on a callback operation, the property must be or an exception is thrown at runtime. 以下属性可用：The following properties are available: - 属性会在通道关闭且回调已处理完所有剩余消息时自动关闭会话。The property automatically closes the session when the channel is closed and the callback has finished processing any remaining messages. - 属性可控制内部线程模型，使系统可以支持可重入或多线程回调对象。The property controls the internal threading model, enabling support for reentrant or multithreaded callback objects. - 属性使运行时可以忽略处理消息时不需要的额外序列化信息。The property enables the runtime to ignore extra serialization information that is not required to process the message. - 属性指定是否将服务中未经处理的异常作为 SOAP 错误返回给服务以供调试。The property specifies whether unhandled exceptions in a service are returned to the service as SOAP faults for debugging purposes. - 属性限制对象图中要序列化的项数。The property limits on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized. - 属性指定协定支持的事务隔离级别。The property specifies the transaction isolation level that the contract supports. - 属性指定必须完成事务的时间段，超过该时间段，事务将中止。The property specifies the time period within which a transaction must complete or it aborts. - 属性指示是否要使用当前的 对象自动同步入站方法调用。The property indicates whether to synchronize inbound method calls automatically using the current object. - 属性通知系统它是否应确认标记为 `MustUnderstand` 的 SOAP 标头是否确实已被理解。The property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了回调对象上的 ，它使用 对象确定要封送到的线程，使用 属性强制执行消息验证，并使用 属性将异常作为 对象返回给服务以便进行调试。The following code example shows a on a callback object that uses the object to determine which thread to marshal to, the property to enforce message validation, and the property to return exceptions as objects to the service for debugging purposes. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认设置为：The default settings for the are: - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 设置为 。The is set to . - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. - 为 `false`。 is `false`. - 为 `false`。 is `false`. - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了回调对象上的 ，它使用 对象确定要封送到的线程，使用 属性强制执行消息验证，并使用 属性将异常作为 对象返回给服务以便进行调试。The following code example shows a on a callback object that uses the object to determine which thread to marshal to, the property to enforce message validation, and the property to return exceptions as objects to the service for debugging purposes. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指定是否在服务关闭双工会话时自动关闭会话。

span.span: Specifies whether to automatically close a session when a service closes a duplex session.

value.span: 如果双工回调对象在服务关闭双工会话时自动关闭会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if duplex callback objects automatically close a session when the service closes a duplex session; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当服务关闭双工会话且回调已处理完所有剩余消息时，回调会关闭会话。By default, when a service closes a duplex session and the callback has finished processing any remaining messages, the callback closes the session. 将 设置为 `false`，可以防止客户端自动关闭会话。Setting to `false` prevents the client from automatically closing the session.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是支持单线程、多线程还是支持可重入调用。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a service supports one thread, multiple threads, or reentrant calls.
One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示回调对象的实例是支持单线程，还是支持可同时执行的多线程；如果是单线程，是否支持可重入。This property indicates whether an instance of a callback object supports one thread or multiple threads that execute concurrently, and if single-threaded, whether reentrancy is supported. 将 设置为 ，可以指示系统将服务实例限制为一次只运行一个执行线程，如此一来，您就不必处理线程问题。Setting to instructs the system to restrict instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, which frees you from dealing with threading issues. 这是默认值。This is the default value. 如果值为 ，则意味着在任一时刻都可以通过多个线程来执行服务对象。A value of means that service objects can be executed by multiple threads at any one time. 在此情况下，必须确保线程安全和状态一致。In this case, you must ensure thread safety and state consistency. 还限制一次对单个线程的访问。 also restricts access to a single thread at a time. 但是，它会使来自执行服务方法的调用可以返回并重入该执行服务。However, it enables calls out from an executing service method to return and reenter the executing service. 可重入调用可以在其他托管线程上执行，但是在此情况下，就会在可重入调用的持续时间内阻止原始线程。A reentrant call can execute on a different managed thread, but in this case the original thread is blocked for the duration of the reentrant call. 通常，如果到达的消息与实例的并发模式冲突，则该消息会等待，直到可使用实例或超时为止。Generally, if a message arrives for an instance that violates its concurrency mode, the message waits until the instance is available, or until it times out. 此外，如果 设置为 且可重入调用已在等待释放实例时被阻止，则系统会检测到死锁，并引发异常。In addition, if the is set to and a reentrant call is blocked while waiting for the instance to be freed, the system detects the deadlock and throws an exception. 有关并发的详细信息，请参阅 和 [会话、实例化和并发](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency)。For more information about concurrency, see and [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency).

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否将未知序列化数据发送到网络上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.

value.span: 如果永不发送未知序列化数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个类型实现 接口，则该接口就会存储在反序列化到该类型时通过网络传入的所有未知额外数据。If a type implements the interface, it stores any extra data it does not know about that comes over the wire when deserializing into that type. 例如，如果 `Person` 类型具有 `FirstName` 和 `LastName` 成员，且有一个名为 `PhoneNumber` 的元素进入，则系统会存储该元素。For example, if a type `Person` has members `FirstName` and `LastName`, and an element called `PhoneNumber` comes in, it is stored. 在以后序列化该类型时，会重新发出 `PhoneNumber`。When later serializing the type, `PhoneNumber` is re-emitted. 问题在于 `Person` ，该服务所导出的架构只具有 `FirstName` 和 `LastName` ，因此 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 会生成一个架构无效的实例。The problem is that the schema for `Person` exported by that service only has `FirstName` and `LastName`, so Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) generates a schema-invalid instance. 如果一定要严格遵从架构，则可以将 设置为 `true`，以关闭此重新发出行为。If strict schema compliance is important, you can set to `true` to turn this re-emitting behavior off. 无论设置如何 ，WCF 都始终处理 (传入和传出的已知数据) 并且当有额外的数据时不引发异常。Regardless of the setting, WCF always processes known data (both in and out) and does not throw exceptions when extra data comes in. 您可以使用[ < callbackDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug)元素在客户端应用程序配置文件中设置此属性。You can use the [<callbackDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug) element to set this property in a client application configuration file.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否要将常规未处理执行异常转换为 类型的 并将其作为错误消息发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a of type and sent as a fault message.

summary.span: 仅在开发阶段将其设置为 以便对服务进行故障排除。

span.span: Set this to only during development to troubleshoot a service.

value.span: 如果未经处理的异常将作为 SOAP 错误返回，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`，可以使异常信息在可能的情况下流回服务，以便进行调试。Set to `true` to enable exception information to flow back to services for debugging purposes when possible. 此功能仅用于开发，不应在已部署的服务中使用。This is a development-only feature and should not be employed in deployed services. 这些错误在调用服务上显示为 对象。These faults appear to the calling service as objects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置 以 `true` 使服务能够获取有关内部客户端回调异常的信息; 仅建议将其作为一种暂时调试双工客户端应用程序的方法。Setting to `true` enables services to obtain information about internal client callback exceptions; it is only recommended as a way of temporarily debugging a duplex client application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了回调对象上的 ，它使用 对象确定要封送到的线程，使用 属性强制执行消息验证，并使用 属性将异常作为 对象返回给服务以便进行调试。The following code example shows a on a callback object that uses the object to determine which thread to marshal to, the property to enforce message validation, and the property to return exceptions as objects to the service for debugging purposes. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.

value.span: 对象中允许的最大项数。

span.span: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，可以限制对象图中要序列化的项数。Use the property set a limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized. 你还可以使用[ < dataContractSerializer > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer)元素在客户端应用程序配置文件中设置此值。You can also use the [<dataContractSerializer>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer) element to set this value in a client application configuration file.

span.span: Specifies the transaction isolation level.

value.span: 一个 值，指定事务的隔离级别。

span.span: A value that specifies the transaction isolation level.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行事务时所采用的隔离级别可确定在其他事务中进行更改时处理数据的方式，以及事务必须保持锁定以保护数据不被更改的时间长度。The isolation level in which your transaction runs determines how data is treated when changes are made in other transactions and how long your transaction must hold locks to protect against these changes. 例如，默认值 指定在事务完成之前不允许进行更新或插入。For example, the default value, , specifies that no updating or inserting can occur until the transaction is complete.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

span.span: A object that represents the time within which transactions must complete or be automatically aborted.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，在应用程序配置文件中设置此值。This value is typically set in an application configuration file.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否使用当前同步上下文来选择执行的线程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.

value.span: 如果对服务的所有调用都必须在 指定的线程上运行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the ; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以提供某些应用程序所需的用户界面线程关联。Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require. 例如，Windows 窗体应用程序可能被注册为单一实例服务对象。For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object. 在这种情况下，对该服务的所有调用都必须在 Windows 窗体线程上运行。In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread. 默认情况下， 设置为 `true`，这会使对该服务的所有调用都同步在用户界面线程上运行。The default case, in which is set to `true`, synchronizes all calls to the service to run on the user interface thread. 请注意，当调用 或 时，所使用的线程为当前同步线程。Note that the thread used is the current synchronization thread when or is called. 如果是 Windows 窗体应用程序，则这意味着这些调用应该在调用 方法之后发生。In the case of an Windows Forms application, this means that these calls should occur after a call to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了回调对象上的 ，它使用 对象确定要封送到的线程，使用 属性强制执行消息验证，并使用 属性将异常作为 对象返回给服务以便进行调试。The following code example shows a on a callback object that uses the object to determine which thread to marshal to, the property to enforce message validation, and the property to return exceptions as objects to the service for debugging purposes. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是由系统还是由应用程序强制执行 SOAP 标头处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果由系统执行 SOAP 标头 处理，则为 ，否则为 ，这表示由应用程序执行此处理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来关闭对到达的消息头强制执行验证。Use the property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers. 在正常执行过程中，将消息头与 属性进行比较，来确认是否由运行时回调对象显式处理到达的消息。In normal execution, message headers are compared against the property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the callback object runtime. 将此属性设置为 `false` 可以禁用此检查。Set this to `false` to disable this checking. 当设置为 `false` 时，应用程序必须检查有 MustUnderstand="true" 标记的标头，如果其中一个或多个标头没有被理解，则返回错误。When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood. 当回调应接受任何传入的 SOAP 消息（例如，使用类型化消息或非类型化消息）以及执行自定义标头处理时，这将很有用。This is useful when the callback is supposed to accept any incoming SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了回调对象上的 ，它使用 对象确定要封送到的线程，使用 属性强制执行消息验证，并使用 属性将异常作为 对象返回给服务以便进行调试。The following code example shows a on a callback object that uses the object to determine which thread to marshal to, the property to enforce message validation, and the property to return exceptions as objects to the service for debugging purposes. [!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]
